DescriptionData.Title: Santa in the Chimney Silk Routine
DescriptionData.Description: This occupies no space but works great! Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk. Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks. The Santa vanishes into the chimney but where? Maybe he got stuck! Magically, you pull him out but he's covered in soot! And where are the gifts? They're in the bag that you showed empty before you started. This can be done your way, using thumbtips, change bag, etc. An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks.
It occupies no space but plays great!
Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk.

DescriptionData.Title: Itty Bitty Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Itty Bitty is our smallest traditional change bag. Just like our larger change bags, this wood handled velvet pouched bag is large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouthcoil, or a host of other small items you can find on our (Pocket Magic) page. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouth coil, or other small items

DescriptionData.Title: Egg Nest Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This colorful and eye-catching trick makes a great impact - everyone likes to the chance to win something for free! Show your audience five colorful plastic Easter eggs, and slip a gold coin, dollar bill or a ring into the one of the eggs (without showing which color egg has the item). Four people are invited to reach into the bag without looking and remove an egg, and you take the last egg. Of course the egg left for you is the one with the the valuables! Also a great way to give something special to the birthday child. Directions and ideas included. Very easy to do. Need some (Silly Rings)?

DescriptionData.Title: Scarecrow Viper Split Fangs
DescriptionData.Description: Scarecrow Viper Fangs are easy to customize without any need for messy adhesives, glues or putty. Once customized they are easy to apply and remove.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use custom fangs for most realistic effects for halloween or entertainment
Customized Fangs can be reused multiple times
Easy to pop in and pop out
Non-toxic and safe to use on teeth

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Large Pig Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Large Pig Nose turns any human child into a barnyard animal. The Woochie Large Pig Nose is a latex prosthetic nose. The Pig Nose comes in two pieces, the nose piece and the chin piece. The pig nose piece is 2" long. This Pig nose is easily applied using spirit gum (sold separately) and with proper care, can be used again and again. Please use with children 8 years and older.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Large Witch Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Large Witch Nose adds lots of ugly warts to any face. The Woochie Large Witch nose is a 2.5" latex prosthetic nose. Foam latex appliances are easily attached to the face using spirit gum (sold separately) and with proper care, can be used again and again. Please use with children 8 years and older.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Popcorn Dye Magic Box
DescriptionData.Description: This great utility item has so many uses. A cardboard popcorn box is shown empty. Suddenly, silks are magically produced from it! It can also be used to vanish silks or make them change color. Other small items can also be used in the box. The perfect vanish for (20th Century Silks).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magic item disappearing and re-appearing popcorn box

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Super Stick Double Sided Tape
DescriptionData.Description: A half inch by 100 inch roll of double-sided adhesive film with great holding power. It is water resistant, ideal for sensitive skin and is not affected by freezing. Just cut it to fit your needs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ProKnows super stick double sided tape

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Acrylic Adhesive (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Acrylic-based, high-tack adhesive works great, just like ProKnows Adhesive, but without the latex for those who are sensitive. Clean your nose or remove build-up of adhesive in your clown nose with ProKnows Dissolvent.

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Latex Adhesive (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Designed specially to work with all ProKnows noses and tips. 1 oz. size. Clean your nose or remove build-up of adhesive in your clown nose with ProKnows Dissolvent.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Designed to work with all ProKnows noses and tips
Item can't be shipped in the winter months

DescriptionData.Title: Cinema Secrets Flesh (Lt Tan) Latex Adhesive (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Cinema Secrets Flesh Latex is a natural rubber adhesive that has a tint of flesh tone, making it great for blending the edges of bald caps and other latex appliances or creating wrinkle effects on skin. 1 ounce size.
Please note that we cannot ship liquid latex items in the winter months, as freezing will damage them.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Cinema Secrets Liquid Latex will give 10 to 50 applications, depending on use You can apply dozens of prosthetics, or do 1-2 skin effects

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Skull EZ FX Kits
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Skull EZ Kit is an face paint set that turns any head into a long-dead skull head. The Woochie Skull Kit comes with face paint instructions, .08 ounce of skull white, yellow and black face paint colors, 2 sponge wedges, .5 ounce of powder, one powder puff. You can easily face paint on that dead for a long time look.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Shredded
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle "That" Restickable Adhesive
DescriptionData.Description: If your nose is a well-fitting one, "THAT" glue will work the best. The NON-LATEX formula has a special restickable ability which allows you to remove and reattach the nose several times without having to reapply the glue. So this 1.25 oz. bottle goes a long way! Jim says the Restickable Adhesive can also be used as an eyelash adhesive. Apply a thin line of it to the eyelash ONLY (not your eye!) and let it dry till it's completely clear.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Can also be used as an eyelash adhesive

DescriptionData.Title: Tootsie Pops
DescriptionData.Description: One at a time, four Tootsie Roll pops are pulled from a bag, showing four different flavors. Pick two flavors for yourself to keep and hand the bag with the remaining two to a spectator. But then? They have disappeared! Magically they are in the other bag along with your pops! Now all four are handed out for audience to enjoy! Such a massive upgrade from the old flat plastic lollipop trick! An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes a bag and four Tootsie Roll pops

DescriptionData.Title: Vanishing Cane Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: You twirl a cane between your fingers and even tap it on the floor to prove it's solid. While you hold the cane on each end, it instantaneously changes into two large silks (not included) or vanishes altogether! You will also need two (18 inch silks) or 24 inch silks to perform this effect.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Makeup Remover Lotion (4.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: A liquid makeup that helps break down creme makeup quickly and gently, leaving your skin soft! 4.5 oz. size.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Adhesives Dots
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron's double-faced medical grade adhesive tape in round dots is a welcome alternative to messy glues. Their double-faced adhesive tape will keep every clown's nose in place. It goes on easy and comes off clean. 36 dots per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: double-faced medical-grade adhesive tape in round dots
Goes on easy, comes off clean

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows String Kits for Clown Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Replace worn strings on your nose, or convert any full-sized clown nose to a string nose! (Not for use with nose tips.)
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ProKnows string kit for clown noses
Can be used to covert to strong-nose
Not for use with nose tips

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Adhesive Dissolvent (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Designed specially to dissolve ProKnows Adhesives, works to clean your own nose and your ProKnows clown nose. 1 oz. size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Specially designed to dissolve ProKnows adhesives

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Super Stick Adhesive Strips
DescriptionData.Description: Double-sided adhesive strips for an extremely strong yet gentle hold for noses. Comes in 3 inch x 1/2 inch strips, 25 per pack.

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie World's Longest Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie World's Longest Nose is a very long nose which transforms any normal face into a very silly face. The Woochie World's Longest Nose is a latex prosthetic nose that measures a whopping 6" long. The Longest Nose is very easy to apply using spirit gum (sold separately) and can be used again and again with proper care. For children 8 years and older.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Tote Smiley Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Smiley Switch Bag by Sam Tee. These flat, colorful change bags are perfect for many silk changes (available on the (silks page)) or vanishes. Smiley Tote is approx. 9.5" tall x 8" wide;

DescriptionData.Title: Black Feathery Short Eyelashes
DescriptionData.Description: Short feathery eyelashes

DescriptionData.Title: Face Paint Rhinestones - Multi (180/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Round, flat-backed acrylic rhinestones in a packs of assorted colors. Apply with Glitter Glue, Liquid Latex or other adhesive (see below). Faceted rhinestones are perfect for adding bling to your face paint designs. 180 assorted color 5mm size Rhinestones a per pack.

DescriptionData.Title: Scarecrow Fangs Customizing Kit Refill
DescriptionData.Description: Scarecrow Customizing Kit Refill is a great accessory to use in case you need to correct the mold already created.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use to customize Scarecrow fangs
Non-toxic and safe to use on teeth

DescriptionData.Title: Ardell LashGrip Eyelash Adhesive (0.25 oz tube)
DescriptionData.Description: Waterproof, latex-based eyelash adhesive by Ardell that holds strip eyelash securely in place and dries clear. Remove false eyelashes by gently pulling them off your eyelid. Follow up with Eye Makeup Remover or Ardell Lash Free (see below)

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Nose Putty (22 gms)
DescriptionData.Description:
Is your clown nose too big to fit your own nose? No problem! Jim Howle's Putty is the perfect solution. Container holds a ping-pong ball sized glob (22 grams), which should last you a long, long time.
To remove: just dab the main glob of remaining Putty to lift off the used stuff and store back in container -- the Putty can be re-used over and over. If you can take the time to use the Putty correctly, you will REALLY like its properties! For use with Jim Howle Acrylic Noses.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: For use with Jim Howle Acrylic Noses

DescriptionData.Title: Rainbow Eyelashes
DescriptionData.Description: Fun glue-on lashes in assorted colors.

DescriptionData.Title: Colorful Rainbow Gold Clown Eyelashes
DescriptionData.Description: Fun glue-on lashes in assorted colors.

DescriptionData.Title: Schnattlacher Citric Solvent Adhesive Remover (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Removes Schnattlacher Adhesive 101 from your skin like nothing else and smells good, too! 2 oz. size.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Admed Adhesive (0.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron's AdMed Liquid Adhesive is a clear, synthetic adhesive that stands up to the toughest performance conditions. AdMed Liquid Adhesive is used by Professional Clowns to secure their Clown Nose and by Makeup Artists and Special Effects Artists for prosthesis and Bald Caps. AdMed Liquid Adhesive is perspiration resistant and adheres through the most active performances.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Spirit Gum Adhesive Remover (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron Spirit Gum Remover is made to be gentler on your skin than other gum removers. Spirit Gum Remover by Mehron is a specially developed solvent to gently remove makeup adhesives such as Spirit Gum Liquid Adhesive from the skin. Mehron Spirit Gum Remover is used throughout the Performance Industry because Performers recognize the safe effective formula of Mehron Spirit Gum Remover will not damage the skin.
Please note that this item is flammable and cannot be shipped via Air or International shipping.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Mehron Spirit Gum Remover will give 1 to 5 applications, depending on use

DescriptionData.Title: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoo Skin Glue (10 ml)
DescriptionData.Description: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Glue is a cosmetic grade adhesive perfect for glitter tattoos. The Glitter glue is hypoallergenic, contains no latex and can last up to 7 days. This Glimmer Body Art Glitter Glue comes with a handy application brush inside the bottle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Cosmetic grade adhesive perfect for glitter tattoos
Glitter glue is hypoallergenic, contains no latex and can last up to 7 days
To remove from the skin: remove glimmer glue with alcohol or baby oil
Comes with a handy application brush inside the bottle

DescriptionData.Title: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoo Skin Glue (130 ml)
DescriptionData.Description: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Glue is a cosmetic grade adhesive perfect for glitter tattoos. The Glitter glue is hypoallergenic, contains no latex and can last up to 7 days. Glitter Glue refill size and comes with an easy refill cap.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Cosmetic grade adhesive perfect for glitter tattoos
Glitter glue is hypoallergenic, contains no latex and can last up to 7 days
To remove from the skin: remove glimmer glue with alcohol or baby oil
Glitter Glue refill size and comes with an easy refill cap

DescriptionData.Title: Amerikan Body Art Glitter Tattoo Acrylic Body Glue (2.2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Glitter Tattoo Body Glue is a water-resistant medical adhesive, which can be used to apply cosmetic glitter, gems, and prosthetics to skin. This Glitter Tattoo Glue is Pros-Aide brand adhesive, which contains no latex and can be adhered for long periods with no irritation, so it can be used in place of liquid latex or spirit gum. 2 ounce bottle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great to apply cosmetic glitter, gems, and prosthetics to skin
Latex-free and can be used for long periods without irritation
Not recommended for use on face

DescriptionData.Title: Amerikan Body Art Empty Glue Applicator Vials
DescriptionData.Description: Applicator Vial with pipette for easy dispensing of glitter glue for a variety of glitter glue applications such as gems, glitter and prosthetics.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Perfect for a variety of glitter glue uses

DescriptionData.Title: Amerikan Body Art Glitter Tattoo Acrylic Body Glue (10 ml)
DescriptionData.Description: Glitter Tattoo Body Glue is a water-resistant medical acrylic adhesive, which can be used to apply cosmetic glitter, gems, and prosthetics to skin. This Glitter Tattoo Glue is Pros-Aide brand adhesive, which contains no latex and can be adhered for long periods with no irritation, so it can be used in place of liquid latex or spirit gum. 0.33 ounces (10 ml) applicator vial.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great to apply cosmetic glitter, gems, and prosthetics to skin
Latex-free and can be used for long periods without irritation
Not recommended for use on face

DescriptionData.Title: Schnattlacher Adhesive 101 (1.25 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: A strong, rubber-based adhesive that does not harden when left inside your Schnattlacher Nose. It doesn't dry, but stays sticky, so you can peel off your Schnattlacher and replace it between show times. The only adhesive to use with your Schnattlacher nose! Remove with Schnattlacher Citric Solvent. 1.25 oz. size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Doesn't harden, but remains sticky for reuse

DescriptionData.Title: Blue Eyelashes
DescriptionData.Description: Fun glue-on lashes in assorted colors.

DescriptionData.Title: Black Eyelashes with Color
DescriptionData.Description: Fun glue-on lashes in assorted colors.

DescriptionData.Title: Face Paint Rhinestones (180/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Round, flat-backed acrylic rhinestones in a packs of assorted colors. Apply with Glitter Glue, Liquid Latex or other adhesive (see below). Faceted rhinestones are perfect for adding bling to your face paint designs. 180 clear 5mm size Rhinestones a per pack.

DescriptionData.Title: Hand Mirrors
DescriptionData.Description: This Plastic Hand Mirror is wonderful to bring a smile to the child to show your face paint design. The Hand Mirror is about 11 inches in length and will fit into most face painting kits. Assorted colors, sold individually.

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Stickable Gems
DescriptionData.Description: Ruby Red Self Adhesive Peel & Stick Gems come in sheets of 100 acrylic gems in an assortment of 6 colors and 3 shapes. The smallest self adhesive jewel is 3/16 in in diameter and the tear drop shape is 1/4 in x 3/8 in in size. Just peel and stick the gem right onto the skin. Use them like a bindi on the face or as self adhesive body jewels as a ring, bracelet or necklace. Each sheet of self adhesive jewels has 100 jewels.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Just slide off the plastic and stick to add depth to your face painting creations!

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Black Tooth Wax (0.125 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Use Black Tooth Paint wax to create the classic Cletus lost tooth look. Tooth Wax can be put on teeth to make all or only part of them disappear. Apply Tooth Wax and then scrape partially off for a good, rotted tooth look.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.125 ounce container of Graftobian Black Tooth Paint will give 10 to 30 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Gold FX Tooth Paint (0.25 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Tooth FX is a non-toxic, temporary color for teeth that lets you add just the right effect for your character by coloring selected teeth. Mehron Tooth FX dries quickly and last for hours. Each Tooth FX Tooth Paint comes in a 0.25 ounce container and includes instructions.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Blood Red FX Tooth Paint (0.25 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Tooth FX is a non-toxic, temporary color for teeth that lets you add just the right effect for your character by coloring selected teeth. Mehron Tooth FX dries quickly and last for hours. Each Tooth FX Tooth Paint comes in a 0.25 ounce container and includes instructions.

DescriptionData.Title: Scarecrow Bucky Teeth Cap
DescriptionData.Description: Scarecrow Bucky Teeth are easy to customize without any need for messy adhesives, glues or putty. Once customized they are easy to apply and remove.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use bucky teeth cap for most realistic effects for costumes such as clown, hillybilly, cute angel etc.
Customized caps can be reused multiple times
Easy to pop in and pop out
Non-toxic and safe to use on teeth

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Rubber Ears
DescriptionData.Description: These huge, soft vinyl ears fit over your own ears for a super comical look! Ears are about 4 1/2 inches tall and fit best if your own ears have detached earlobes. Also great fun to put over the end of your prop stethoscope for hospital use. Sold in pairs.

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Space Ear Tips - Large
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Small Space Ear Tips are very easy to apply to create hobbit ears, elf ears or alien ears. Woochie Elf Ears are latex prosthetic ears and measure about 2 inches length. Easy to apply and perfect for creating a realistic elf look for Halloween. For children 8 years and older. Spirit Gum and Spirit Gum Remover not included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Cut Set EZ FX Kit
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie 3-D Burn
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Gouge Set EZ FX Kit
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Phantom '98
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Oozing Wounds 3 Pc
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie See No Evil
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Slashed Eye
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Cinema Secrets Woochie Clown Noses (Small)
DescriptionData.Description: Very lightweight rubber noses in matte light red. Especially great for hobo and character clowns. Can be applied with spirit gum, latex, etc. For best results, place a cotton ball in the tip of larger noses to help maintain shape.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Apply grease/cream makeup to nose and set with powder to match makeup
Apply with spirit gum, latex, etc.
Place a cotton ball in the tip of larger noses to help maintain shape
